channel.title: Community-rsps (Updated server) New npcs (New Customs) Complete Makeover!
channel.description:
[SIZE=7][CENTER][IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2qbgfvs.png[/img][/CENTER][/SIZE]
[URL=http://"http://community-rsps.com/forum/forum.php"]Our Forums[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.community-rsps.com/play.html"]Play NOW.[/URL] [URL=http://"http://community-rsps.com/forum/showthread.php?379-Download%20Client-here"]Download Client.[/URL]
[CENTER]Community-rsps has been running for about 4months and i believe its the most advanced 317 out there on rsw, what makes it so unique and advanced? Read and watch the video..
Tokhaar-Kahl [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2zgx8qw.png[/img]
Free for all events Added ffa into the server so whenever there are many people that are pking i can turn ffa on and people will have way more fun pking.
Polypore Staff A fully working polypore staff Uses Magic Requires no runes Custom gfx and animation [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2uo1gg8.png[/img]
Ganodermic/Dragon Kiteshield [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/33ts5z6.png[/img]
Ingame Highscores for those people that like to train to become the best. Advanced econemy, and im serious, the eco is just sick compared to any other server, just picture this: ags is 10mil to the general store and that is the item with the most value, so yeah... But that dosent make its harder to make money, it only depends if you dont know anything about a rsps or not. [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2egfa4h.png[/img]
TriviaBot Example: First person to type c34t5yh@3£ gets 10million gp
Clue Scrolls To much to write There is a guide on this on the forums Show everything from who drops where and what, to drop rates
Quests .Currently have 2 quests Rewards? .Ardy cloak 1 .10million gp .Crystal key Npc kill shop where regular players can buy a yell right
Castle Wars .Basic castle wars like Runescape .Increase armour bounse in shop which takes castle wars tickets [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2qu15io.png[/img]
Custom Construction .Can train it everywhere .Dosent bother others because only you can see it .Got a good idea on how to make it better, post on forums [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/r0rosl.jpg[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/11hz6zm.png[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/ohiw02.png[/img]
[URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ty7ce4RldMc&feature=youtu.be"]Video on our combat system.[/URL] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OfMsM4_vXp8]Community-Rsps Promo v3 04.07.2013 - YouTube[/url] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/2dkmm9c.png[/img][/CENTER]

item.title: Community-rsps (Updated server) New npcs (New Customs) Complete Makeover!
item.dc:creator: @allunited allunited
item.description:
@allunited wrote:

[SIZE=7][CENTER]

2qbgfvs.png722×124
[/CENTER][/SIZE]

Our Forums
Play NOW.
Download Client.

[CENTER]Community-rsps has been running for about 4months and i believe its the most advanced 317 out there on rsw, what makes it so unique and advanced? Read and watch the video…

Tokhaar-Kahl

2zgx8qw.png781×564

Free for all events
Added ffa into the server so whenever there are many people that are pking i can turn ffa on and people will have way more fun pking.

Polypore Staff
A fully working polypore staff
Uses Magic
Requires no runes
Custom gfx and animation

2uo1gg8.png781×572

Ganodermic/Dragon Kiteshield

33ts5z6.png781×572

Ingame Highscores
for those people that like to train to become the best.
Advanced econemy, and im serious, the eco is just sick compared to any other server, just picture this: ags is 10mil to the general store and that is the item with the most value, so yeah…
But that dosent make its harder to make money, it only depends if you dont know anything about a rsps or not.

2egfa4h.png781×564

TriviaBot
Example:
First person to type c34t5yh@3£ gets 10million gp

Clue Scrolls
To much to write
There is a guide on this on the forums
Show everything from who drops where and what, to drop rates

Quests
.Currently have 2 quests
Rewards?
.Ardy cloak 1
.10million gp
.Crystal key
Npc kill shop where regular players can buy a yell right

Castle Wars
.Basic castle wars like Runescape
.Increase armour bounse in shop which takes castle wars tickets

2qu15io.png781×564

Custom Construction
.Can train it everywhere
.Dosent bother others because only you can see it
.Got a good idea on how to make it better, post on forums
